CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, January 6, 1945, pg. 9 reads: "Mercredi Bridge Club, whose charming members are pictured above, chose the windiest, snowiest night for their gala holiday party, which attracted any number of their close friends, in spite of the weather. held in beautiful home of Mr. and Mrs. Stanley Williams, the hostesses entertained until long after midnight.  Shown above are Mesdames Syvilla [Savilla] Williams, Maybelle Nunn, Drucilla Turner, Lydia Cooper, Annabelle Fitts, Julia Webb, Henrietta Sellers, Marian Kydd, Louise Jackson, Maudessa Browne, Wilnette Jones, Lolabella Cole and Dorothy Goggins. - Courier Photo by Harris."
TitMainTitle: Mercredi Bridge Club members, including Savilla Williams, Maybelle Nunn, Drucilla Turner, Lydia Cooper, Annabelle Fitts, Julia Webb, Henrietta Sellers, Marian Kydd, Louise Jackson, Maudessa Browne, Wilnette Jones, Lolabella Cole, and Dorothy Goggins, posed in home of Mr. and Mrs. Stanley Williams, another version
